column4: I use clonezilla to do full disk (dual boot) all the time, never let me down
clonezilla live boots quicker than ubuntu live, obviously.. 1 more reason..
Is it a live cd?
yup
thats how it backs up everything.. nothing is mounted
Thanks, will check it out :)
Nice, can it backup to images to?
i always do
Super :)
Do you know if clonezilla can restore to a larger drive?
Am gonna try and backup the single-disk and then create a RAID and then restore to that.
Thank you! it says "clonezilla server" do i have to set up a server? :-O
get plain clonezilla
Ah, so clonezilla is mentioned as clonezilla server then?
ah :)
Good, super! Thanks for the help :)
Do you know if the live iso is compatible with RAID controllers?
no idea.
ignore that, he thought you were talkin about ubuntu
it doesnt defrag, it just stores files more intelligent than ntfs
Clever :)
